item.title: 软件编译和安装
item.description: 软件编译和安装 qbittorrent编译安装 安装依赖 1 2 apt-get install build-essential pkg-config automake libtool git apt-get install libboost-dev libboost-system-dev libboost-chrono-dev libboost-random-dev libssl-dev libgeoip-dev 安装libtorrent 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 git clone https://github.com/arvidn/libtorrent.git #之前
